title: NIR test program reveals factors affecting flexible packaging sorting - Labels and Labeling
summary: The CEFLEX initiative has released a report on the ability of NIR sorting technology to identify and classify flexible plastic packaging materials. The report provides data on how material structures and design elements affect sorting outcomes, helping to improve design for recycling guidance and optimize the sorting process. The results are based on testing a wide range of samples and are now available for public download.
product_or_process: NIR sorting technology for flexible plastic packaging
likely_naics_codes: ['322210 - Plastics Bag and Pouch Manufacturing', '326199 - Other Plastics Product Manufacturing', '562111 - Solid Waste Collection', '562219 - Other Nonhazardous Waste Treatment and Disposal']
